CZG.PR.summary: CZG - CeskÃ¡ zbrojovka Group SE, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, purchase, and sale of firearms and tactical accessories in Czech Republic, the United States, Europe, Africa, Asia, and internationally. It is also involved in the leasing of real estate; trading in military material; operation of shooting academy; and production of scope mounts. The company markets its products under the CeskÃ¡ zbrojovka, CZ-USA, Dan Wesson, Zbrojovka Brno, and 4M Systems brands. It sells its products for military and law enforcement, personal defense, hunting, sport shooting, and other civilian uses. The company was formerly known as EHC CZUB, SE and changed its name to CZG - CeskÃ¡ zbrojovka Group SE in June 2019. The company was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Prague, Czech Republic. CZG - CeskÃ¡ zbrojovka Group SE is a subsidiary of Ceska Zbrojovka Partners SE.

PRIUA.PR.summary: Primoco UAV SE develops, produces, and sells unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV) and aircraft engines in Russia, the Middle East, Africa, Asia, and South America. It also offers air and training services. The company's products are used in agriculture; remote mapping; power line corridor mapping; military UAV training; civil engineering; law enforcement; surveillance and reconnaissance; airspace navaid systems calibration; electronic warfare; disaster relief; pipeline and energy lines monitoring; railway monitoring; target drone; and environmental protection and research, as well as in coastal surveillance, search and rescue, and border protection activities. Primoco UAV SE was founded in 2015 and is based in Prague, the Czech Republic.

TOMA.PR.summary: TOMA, a.s. engages in the electricity, air, water, steam, and gas distribution businesses in the Czech Republic. It operates a wastewater treatment plant; produces drinking water; develops residential, commercial, and industrial buildings; and offers sewer cleaning, financial leasing, and hydro analytical laboratory services. The company also sells non-residential building and land projects; and rents apartments, commercial and non-residential buildings, and land projects. In addition, it offers railway siding services; disposes hazardous liquid waste; and manages roads in the industrial area. The company is based in Otrokovice, the Czech Republic.
